title: Link
description: Semantic anchor element for navigation, external links, and downloads with multiple style variants and accessibility features.

metadata.description: A versatile link component supporting internal navigation, external links with security attributes, download functionality, and multiple visual variants including CTA styling. Fully accessible with WCAG AA compliance, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Standard link with primary color, underline on hover

variants.name: muted
variants.description: Less prominent link with gray color

variants.name: primary
variants.description: Emphasized link with primary brand color and medium weight

variants.name: cta
variants.description: Button-styled link for call-to-action (semantically still a link)

usageExamples.title: Basic Internal Link
usageExamples.description: Simple navigation link within the site

usageExamples.title: External Link
usageExamples.description: Link to external site with security attributes and icon
usageExamples.code: {{ link({ text: 'Visit Example.com', href: 'https://example.com', external: true }) }}

usageExamples.title: Download Link
usageExamples.description: Link that triggers file download with custom filename
usageExamples.code: {{ link({ text: 'Download PDF', href: '/files/doc.pdf', download: true, downloadFilename: 'brochure.pdf' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Link with Custom Icon
usageExamples.description: Link with custom SVG icon before text

usageExamples.title: Disabled Link
usageExamples.description: Non-interactive link (rarely recommended, prefer removing link instead)
usageExamples.code: {{ link({ text: 'Coming Soon', href: '#', disabled: true }) }}

bestPractices: Use descriptive link text that makes sense out of context
Avoid 'click here' or 'read more' without context
Mark external links appropriately for user awareness
Use CTA variant sparingly for primary actions
Prefer removing links over disabling them
Ensure minimum 44x44px touch target for mobile
seoConsiderations: Internal links help site navigation and crawling
External links with rel=noopener prevent security issues
Download links should have clear descriptive text

text.description: Link text content displayed to users

href.description: Link destination URL (can be relative or absolute)

variant.description: Visual style variant of the link

external.description: If true, link opens in new tab with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer', and displays external link icon

download.description: If true, clicking the link triggers a file download and displays download icon

downloadFilename.description: Custom filename for the download attribute (optional, browser may use href filename if omitted)

iconStart.description: SVG icon HTML to display before the link text

iconEnd.description: SVG icon HTML to display after the link text (note: external and download icons are auto-added)

disabled.description: If true, link is non-interactive with aria-disabled and tabindex=-1 (consider removing link instead)

id.description: Unique identifier for the link element

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the link

attributes.description: Additional HTML attributes to apply to the link element

a11y.description: Accessibility properties for enhanced screen reader support

ariaLabel.description: Accessible label for screen readers (recommended for icon-only links or when link text is ambiguous)

ariaDescribedBy.description: ID of element that describes this link (provides additional context)

ariaLabelledBy.description: ID of element that labels this link

role.description: ARIA role override (rarely needed for semantic anchor elements)
